scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely Saint John the Evangelist, is seated on a rocky, grassy island, writing in a book. A brown bird, holding a scroll or document in its beak, stands before him. The background depicts a serene landscape with a body of water, distant mountains, and a city with a prominent spire in the middle ground. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with floral motifs.
